Author: jl777c#5810
Content: in some places, bitcoin requires optimal varint encoding

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: so if you use 2 bytes for 129 to 255, it could be rejecting it, even though it is valid varint, it isnt optimal

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: the code fix for the pools that i saw used non-optimal varint
